channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Gains to 3rd-Highest Close on Record
item.description: Amid a surge in open interest in precious metals futures, front-month gold futures settled up 0.4% to $2,755 an ounce, the third-highest close in hist...

item.title: Dow Gains More Than 500 Points; Investors Mull Trump Moves
item.description: U.S. tocks climbed following Donald Trump’s return to the Oval Office after promising reports about several companies and no immediate announcement fr...

item.title: Treasury Yields Decline, Dollar Steadies After Inauguration
item.description: The dollar remained subdued on the first U.S. trading session under President Trump.

item.title: Netflix’s subscriber beat sends stock surging — and here’s what‘s to come
item.description: Netflix earnings showed the that company hauled in nearly double the amount of new members that Wall Street was expecting for the fourth quarter.

item.title: Why Trump may need big companies to spend less on stock buybacks

item.title: United Airlines shares rally on profit forecast, helped by premium and economy demand
item.description: Shares of United Airlines Holdings Inc. rallied in after-hours trading Tuesday, after the airline reported fourth-quarter results that beat expectatio...

item.title: ‘I don’t care about Greenland’: How will President Trump 2.0 impact workers like me? I’m 54 and make $150,000.
item.description: “I’m more worried about my financial future.”

item.title: Defense and Space Company Voyager Technologies Files to Go Public
item.description: The sector is expected to benefit under the Trump administration.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Fall on Milder February Outlook
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures settled 4.9% lower as traders looked beyond the snow on the ground in Houston to forecasts for a warmup in early February.
